input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.h1: South Euclid Lyndhurst School District News Article

span.p:
The South Euclid Lyndhurst School District will provide free breakfast and lunch for all PreK-12 students who currently attend Brush, Memorial, Greenview, Adrian, Rowland, or Sunview.
The District will provide a Grab-and-Go bagged lunch/breakfast starting March 17, from 10:00 am-12:00 pm M-F, during the entire extended school closure. Brush High School will be the only pickup location. Pickup will be at the back of Brush High School along Farnhurst Rd. (see below)
Upon pickup, you will be asked to identify your children by name, and school of attendance.
We will communicate any changes as the current events continue to evolve.
